languages.text:
The Assassin makes an enemy suffer −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.
-<indent=5%>If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the Assassin's next turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until their next turn.</indent>
languages.original_text:
До конца своего хода ассасин уменьшает у цели {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на {uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} урона на {uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}.
-<indent=5%>Если на соседних клетках с ассасином находится только один противник, ассасин также получает +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} до своего следующего хода.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Если на соседних клетках нет противников, ассасин получает +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} до своего следующего хода.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
The Assassin makes an enemy suffer −<u>(3 × Assassin's AGI bonus)</u>% armour reduction and −<u>(Assassin's PER bonus − 1)</u> deflection reduction until the end of the Assassin's turn.
- If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +<u>(3 × Assassin's AGI bonus)</u>% dodge until the Assassin's next turn.
- If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +<u>(3 × PER bonus)</u>% dodge penetration until their next turn.

The Assassin makes an enemy suffer a -<u>3×(Assassin's AGI bonus)</u>% armour reduction and a -<u>(Assassin's PER bonus)-1</u> deflection reduction until the end of the Assassin's turn.
- If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +<u>3×(Assassin's AGI bonus)</u>% dodge until the Assassin's next turn.
- If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +<u>3×(PER bonus)</u>% Dodge Penetration until their next turn.

The Assassin makes an enemy suffer −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.
-<indent=5%>If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the Assassin's next turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until their next turn.</indent>

The Assassin makes an enemy suffer −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
- If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} until the Assassin's next turn.
- If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until their next turn.

The Assassin makes an enemy suffer −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.
-<indent=5%>If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the Assassin's next turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until their next turn.</indent>

languages.text:
До конца своего хода ассасин уменьшает у цели {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на {uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} урона на {uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}.
-<indent=5%>Если на соседних клетках с ассасином находится только один противник, ассасин также получает +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} до своего следующего хода.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Если на соседних клетках нет противников, ассасин получает +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} до своего следующего хода.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin makes an enemy suffer −<u>(3 × Assassin's AGI bonus)</u>% armour reduction and −<u>(Assassin's PER bonus − 1)</u> deflection reduction until the end of the Assassin's turn.
- If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +<u>(3 × Assassin's AGI bonus)</u>% dodge until the Assassin's next turn.
- If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +<u>(3 × PER bonus)</u>% dodge penetration until their next turn.

traits.locale_text:
До конца своего хода ассасин уменьшает у цели броню на <u>(3 × бонус ЛВК ассасина)</u>% и отражение урона на <u>(бонус ВОС ассасина − 1)</u>.
- Если на смежных клетках рядом с ассасином находится только один противник, ассасин также получает +<u>(3 × бонус ЛВК ассасина)</u>% к уклонению до своего следующего хода.
- Если на соседних клетках нет противников, ассасин получает +<u>(3 × бонус ВОС)</u>% к снижению уклонения до своего следующего хода.

До конца своего хода ассасин уменьшает у цели броню на <u>(3 × бонус ЛВК ассасина)</u>% и отражение урона на <u>(бонус ВОС ассасина − 1)</u>.
- Если на смежных клетках рядом с ассасином находится только один противник, ассасин также получает +<u>(3 × бонус ЛВК ассасина)</u>% к уклонению до своего следующего хода.
- Если на соседних клетках нет противников, ассасин получает +<u>(3 × бонус ВОС)</u>% к снижению уклонения до своего следующего хода.

До конца своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} ассасин уменьшает у цели {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на {uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение урона{/g} на {uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}.
- Если на смежных клетках рядом с ассасином находится только один противник, ассасин также получает +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} до своего следующего хода.
- Если на соседних клетках нет противников, ассасин получает +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% к снижению уклонения до своего следующего хода.

languages.text:
刺客使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}%，使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}点，此效果持续至刺客的回合结束为止。
-<indent=5%>如果刺客身边只有一名敌人，刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}%，此效果持续至刺客的下个回合开始为止。</indent>
-<indent=5%>如果刺客身边没有任何敌人，刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}提高{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}%，此效果持续至刺客的下个回合开始为止。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin makes an enemy suffer −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.
-<indent=5%>If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the Assassin's next turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until their next turn.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
刺客使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低<u>（3×刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）%</u>，使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低<u>（刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}加值-1）</u>，此效果持续至刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。
- 如果刺客身边只有一名敌人，刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}提高<u>（3×刺客的敏捷加值）</u>%，此效果持续至刺客的下个回合开始为止。
- 如果刺客身边没有任何敌人，刺客的闪避穿透提高<u>（3×刺客的感知加值）</u>%，此效果持续至刺客的下个回合开始为止。

刺客使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}，使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}，此效果持续至刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。
- 如果刺客身边只有一名敌人，刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}提高{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}%，此效果持续至刺客的下个回合开始为止。
- 如果刺客身边没有任何敌人，刺客的闪避穿透提高{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}%，此效果持续至刺客的下个回合开始为止。

languages.text:
El asesino hace que un enemigo sufra un −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} hasta el final del turno del asesino.
-<indent=5%>Si solo hay 1 enemigo adyacente al asesino, este gana también un +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta su próximo turno.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si no hay ningún enemigo adyacente al asesino, este gana un +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} hasta su próximo turno.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin makes an enemy suffer −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.
-<indent=5%>If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the Assassin's next turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until their next turn.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} hace que un enemigo sufra un −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del asesino.
- Si solo hay 1 enemigo adyacente al asesino, este gana también un +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta su próximo turno.
- Si no hay ningún enemigo adyacente al asesino, este gana un +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} hasta su próximo turno.

El asesino hace que un enemigo sufra un −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % de reducción de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y un −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} de reducción del {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del asesino.
- Si solo hay 1 enemigo adyacente al asesino, este gana también un +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} hasta su próximo turno.
- Si no hay ningún enemigo adyacente al asesino, este gana un +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % de penetración de esquiva hasta su próximo turno.

languages.text:
Der Assassine belegt einen Feind mit −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} bis zum Ende des Zugs des Assassinen.
-<indent=5%>Befindet sich nur 1 Feind in der Nähe, erhält der Assassine außerdem +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} bis zum nächsten Zug des Assassinen.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Befinden sich keine Feinde in der Nähe des Assassinen, erhält er +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} bis zu seinem nächsten Zug.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin makes an enemy suffer −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.
-<indent=5%>If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the Assassin's next turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until their next turn.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} beeinträchtigt einen Feind mit −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection} Deflektion{/g} bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Assassinen.
- Befindet sich nur 1 Feind in der Nähe, erhält der Assassine außerdem +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} bis zum nächsten Zug des Assassinen.
- Befinden sich keine Feinde in der Nähe des Assassinen, erhält er +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} bis zu seinem nächsten Zug.

Der Assassine beeinträchtigt einen Gegner mit −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstungsreduzierung{/g} und −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Assassinen.
- Befindet sich nur 1 Gegner in der Nähe, erhält der Assassine außerdem +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} bis zur nächsten Runde des Assassinen.
- Befinden sich keine Gegner in der Nähe des Assassinen, erhält er +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% Ausweichdurchdringung bis zu seiner nächsten Runde.

languages.text:
L'assassin inflige −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} à un ennemi jusqu'à la fin de son tour.
-<indent=5%>En présence d'un seul ennemi adjacent, l'assassin gagne également +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'à son tour suivant.</indent>
-<indent=5%>En l'absence d'ennemis adjacents, l'assassin bénéficie de +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} jusqu'à son tour suivant.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin makes an enemy suffer −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.
-<indent=5%>If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the Assassin's next turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until their next turn.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
L'Assassin fait subir à un ennemi -<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} de l'Assassin)</u> % de réduction d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et -<u>(bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} de l'Assassin - 1)</u> de réduction de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
- En présence d'un seul ennemi adjacent, l'Assassin gagne également +<u>(3 × bonus d'AGI de l'Assassin)</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} jusqu'à son tour suivant.
- En l'absence d'ennemis adjacents, l'Assassin bénéficie de +<u>(3 × bonus de PER)</u> % de pénétration d'esquive jusqu'à son tour suivant.

L'Assassin fait subir à un ennemi -{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % de réduction d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et -{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} de réduction de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
- En présence d'un seul ennemi adjacent, l'Assassin gagne également +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} jusqu'à son tour suivant.
- En l'absence d'ennemis adjacents, l'Assassin bénéficie de +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} % de pénétration d'esquive jusqu'à son tour suivant.

languages.text:
アサシンが、アサシンのターン終了時まで、敵に−{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}%の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}減少と、 −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}減少を与える。
-<indent=5%>隣接している敵が1体のみの場合、アサシンは次のターンまで+{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を得る。</indent>
-<indent=5%>アサシンに隣接している敵がいない場合、次のターン終了まで+%{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}を得る。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin makes an enemy suffer −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.
-<indent=5%>If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the Assassin's next turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until their next turn.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
アサシンが、アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで、敵に−<u>(3 × アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}減少と、 −<u>(アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}ボーナス − 1)</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}減少を与える。
- 隣接している敵が1体のみの場合、アサシンは次のターンまで+<u>(3 × アサシンのAGIボーナス)</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}も得る。
-アサシンに隣接している敵がいない場合、次のターン終了まで+<u>(3 × PER ボーナス)</u>%の回避貫通を得る。

アサシンが、アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで、敵に−{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}%の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}減少と、 −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}減少を与える。
- 隣接している敵が1体のみの場合、アサシンは次のターンまで+{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}%の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}も得る。
-アサシンに隣接している敵がいない場合、次のターン終了まで+{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}%の回避貫通を得る。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}が、アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで、敵に−{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}%の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}減少と、 −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}減少を与える。
-<indent=5%>隣接している敵が1体のみの場合、アサシンは次のターンまで+{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を得る。</indent>
-<indent=5%>アサシンに隣接している敵がいない場合、次のターン終了まで+%{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避貫通{/g}を得る。</indent>

languages.text:
Suikastçı, bir düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerini %{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerini ise {uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} azaltır. Etkisi, Suikastçı'nın turu sonlanana dek sürer.
-<indent=5%>Suikastçı, bitişiğinde yalnızca 1 düşman varsa ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerine +%{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} kazanır. Etkisi, Suikastçı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek sürer.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Suikastçı, bitişiğinde hiç düşman yoksa {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} değerine +%{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} kazanır. Etkisi, Suikastçı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek sürer.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin makes an enemy suffer −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.
-<indent=5%>If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the Assassin's next turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until their next turn.</indent>
